text: Timimadhye jo guni ra samathryavana chan uniharula'i aphno natedara, nimukha, gariba ra allahako margama gharabara chadneharula'i sahayoga dinubata panchine kama garnuhumdaina, baru uniharula'i avasyaka cha ki ksama garide'un ra uniharuko trutiko vasta nagaruna. Ke timi yo cahadainaum ki allahale timila'i ksama garos? Allaha galtiharula'i maphi dine atyanta dayavana cha
